## ConsoleSinkConfigService.(constructor)

Creates instance of `ConsoleSinkConfigService`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  maxLogsCount | number | Maximal number of logs that can be stored |
